content: Excellent article which I am sharing with the 300 or so shrinks I communicate with via Facebook. John Gartner sent me an email with a link to your article. The only quible I have, which you can check with John on, is that the current number to sign his petition is 23,222. Add in the 35 who just published a letter in the New York Times, and other shrinks on Facebook groups I’d say that you could safely say “more than 23,000.” https://www.change.org/p/trump-is-mentally-ill-and-must-be-removed
